project.description: Android Nougat Release s5p6818 daily build

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
echo "*****************************************" echo " Jenkins - Android environment setup " echo "*****************************************"
export LC_ALL=en_US.UTF-8 export LANG=en_US.UTF-8 export LANGUAGE=en_US.UTF-8 export USER=nxJenkins
repo sync
echo "*************************************" echo " Android nougat release s5p6818 avn_ref " echo "*************************************" ./device/nexell/avn_ref/build.sh -s s5p6818 -d result-s5p6818-release-avn_ref ./device/nexell/avn_ref/build.sh -s s5p6818 -q -d result-s5p6818-release-avn_ref-quick

#!/bin/bash
echo "************************************" echo " clean old dirs " echo "************************************" rm -rf result-*-daily rm -rf result-*-daily.tar.gz
echo "************************************" echo " Compress and Upload to Snapshot server " echo "************************************" cp ${JENKINS_HOME}/snapshot_build_info/BUILD-INFO.txt result-s5p6818-release-avn_ref/ tar cvzf result-s5p6818-avn_ref-nougat-release.tar.gz result-s5p4418-nougat-release-avn_ref/* mv result-s5p6818-avn_ref-nougat-release.tar.gz result-s5p6818-android-nougat-release-avn_ref-`date +%Y%m%d`-daily.tar.gz mv result-s5p6818-release-avn_ref result-s5p6818-android-nougat-release-avn_ref-`date +%Y%m%d`-daily
cp ${JENKINS_HOME}/snapshot_build_info/BUILD-INFO.txt result-s5p6818-release-avn_ref-quick/ tar cvzf result-s5p6818-avn_ref-nougat-quick-release.tar.gz result-s5p4418-nougat-release-avn_ref-quick/* mv result-s5p6818-avn_ref-nougat-quick-release.tar.gz result-s5p6818-android-nougat-release-avn_ref-quick-`date +%Y%m%d`-daily.tar.gz mv result-s5p6818-release-avn_ref-quick result-s5p6818-android-nougat-quick-release-avn_ref-`date +%Y%m%d`-daily
